description: This file provides utility functions for managing IndexedDB storage and application state persistence for a Kanban board application. It includes functions to initialize the database, save, load, delete, bulk save, and clear data in IndexedDB, as well as fallback functions for localStorage.

methods.name: initIndexedDB
methods.description: Initializes the IndexedDB database with specific object stores for the Kanban app.

methods.name: saveToIndexedDB
methods.description: Saves a data object to a specified object store in IndexedDB.

methods.name: loadFromIndexedDB
methods.description: Retrieves a data object from a specified object store in IndexedDB by key.

methods.name: loadAllFromIndexedDB
methods.description: Loads all data from a specified object store, with optional filtering.

methods.name: deleteFromIndexedDB
methods.description: Deletes a data entry from a specified object store in IndexedDB by key.

methods.name: bulkSaveToIndexedDB
methods.description: Bulk inserts or updates multiple items into a specified object store.

methods.name: clearStoreInIndexedDB
methods.description: Clears all data from a specified object store.

methods.name: loadAppState
methods.description: Loads application state from localStorage as a fallback.

methods.name: saveAppState
methods.description: Saves application state to localStorage as a fallback.

methods.name: clearAppState
methods.description: Removes persisted application state from localStorage.
